actions.title: FL Limitation
actions.lido: Please overwrite the MAX FL on Aircraft Operator  page Speed and Performance Tab(MAX Alternate and MaxCruise)

actions.title: TCAS INOP
actions.other:
No class E airspace, no KEF flights (at least below NAT HLA)
Max 10 days in EU, except Germany: 3 days rule. Other countries: check CRAR

actions.title: CPDLC INOP
actions.lido: Remove: from item10a:J1,J4                                                            Insert 10a: Z,                                                                                                   Insert item 18 DAT/CPDLCX
actions.other: Check CRAR amd OM C Airport Briefing

actions.title: ADF INOP
actions.other: Check  ADF requirement for DEP/DES/ALT airports

actions.title: ADS-B INOP
actions.lido: Remove: from item10b:L and B1,                                          Insert: H to item  10b                                                                 Insert: SUR/EUADSBX  item 18
actions.other:
SINGLE EUROPEAN SKY (SES): 
The 27 EU Member States ( Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, 
Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden) plus Norway and Switzerland (29 States in total).

We can operate with ADS-B OUT inoperative within SES for 3 days.
Restrictions for countries outside of SES should be checked in CRAR!

actions.title: BOTH GPS INOP
actions.lido: Remove: from item 10a:G, Remove:item 18  PBN:A1, B1,C1,D1,O1,O2,S2 insert: B3,B4,B5,C4,D4                  Remove: from item 10a:X,                                                 Remove:item 18 TCAS
actions.other: Please Check equipment requirement for DEP/DES/ALT airports For ADS-B see note on ADS-B inop for SES

actions.title: Dual VOR INOP
actions.lido: Remove: from item 10a:S, select n(Non-Standard Equipment)                                                                                             Insert L (ILS) and V (VHF RTF)                                                      Remove: from item 18 B1                                               Insert:B2,B3,B5
actions.other: Check CRAR amd OM C Airport Briefing

actions.title: Wx Radar INOP
actions.other:
Check the whole RTE and ALTN RTE for any hazardous WX condition (icing, turbulence, jet stream, etc)
Use both maps (most helpful is FL100-FL450)

actions.title: No Iceing Condition
actions.other: Check the whole RTE for any possible icing condition (icing areas, CB). Please, check also the TAF, SNOWTAM and METAR for DEP/DES/ALT airports

actions.title: ILS Category limitation   (Basic: CAT3B autoland cat 3A)
triggers: ILS Category limitation   (Basic: CAT3B autoland cat 3A)
actions.lido: Please overwrite the Landing Capability on Aircraft Operator  page Equipment Tab (Standard Approach Equipment) according to MEL.                                       Overwrite: AIRCRAFT/DATA FOR ICAO FPL: RVR in item 18 For CAT I: 550m CAT II: 300m CAT IIIA:200m CAT III B : 75m

actions.title: (E)GPWS INOP
actions.other: Check OM  C Airport Briefing  for DEP/DES/ALT airports                     Example: FNC (Madeira)flight

actions.title: Center Tank Transfer Valve 28-26-01
actions.other: NO GO FOR  LONG FLIGHTS: FNC, TFS, FUE, LPA, KEF, DXB,AUH

actions.title: MCDU INOP                             22-82-01/02
actions.lido: Remove: from item 10a:X,                                                 Remove:item 18 PBN: A1, C1,L1,
